main

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the overall structure of the simulation, such as generating populations and handling successive iterations of evolution. Also writes the results to a file occasionally.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Simulation() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void loadSimulation(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a Mathling from a file, then evolves it in a simulation.
      static void runNewSimulation()
      Starts a simulation from scratch with randomized Mathlings.
      static void runSimulation(Mathling[] mathlings)
      Continues a simulation, given an array of Mathlings to work with.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Simulation

    • Method Detail

      • runSimulation

        public static void runSimulation(Mathling[] mathlings)
        Continues a simulation, given an array of Mathlings to work with.
        Parameters:
        mathlings - The population to evolve.
        See Also:
        Mathling

      • runNewSimulation

        public static void runNewSimulation()
        Starts a simulation from scratch with randomized Mathlings.
        See Also:
        Mathling, runSimulation(Mathling[])

      • loadSimulation

        public static void loadSimulation(java.lang.String name)
        Loads a Mathling from a file, then evolves it in a simulation. Useful for continuing where you left off in long-term simulations.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the serialized Mathling to load.
        See Also:
        MathlingSaver.loadMathling(String), Mathling, runSimulation(Mathling[])
